main: *Hi!* I am bot which makes daily raffle. To know more about me, click on menu
commands: Choose command to know more about it
name:
`/setname` â€” set name of daily raffle.
_Usage:_
/setname â€” show current name of daily raffle
/setname TEXT â€” set name of daily raffle to `TEXT`
Back%commands
admin:
`/admgroup` â€” manages rights.
_Usage:_
/admgroup add â€” Allows user to do admin stuff
/admgroup del â€” disallows user to do admin stuff
/admgroup list â€” list of people who can do admin stuff in this bot
count: `/count` â€” count of users that currently are in daily raffle
spin: `/spin` â€” Starts raffle. If there were already raffle today, it shows winner of todays raffle
auto:
`/auto` - settings of automatical raffle.
_Usage:_
/auto set TIME â€” sets auto raffle time to `TIME` GMT+0 (MSK-3). Time format: `hh:mm`
/auto del â€” disabels automatic raffle
/auto status â€” state of automatic raffle

WARNING! If there were raffle before automatic raffle, bot will do nothing at automatic raffle time
stat:
`/stat` â€” chat statistics.
_Usage:_
/stat â€” statistics of all chat or specified user
/stat me â€” statistics of you

user_count: Count of people which is registered in raffle: _{0}_
time_error: Error! Check if time is right and then edit the message
auto_spin_on: Auto raffle time set to {0} GMT+0
auto_spin_off: Auto raffle is disabled in this chat/
auto_spin_set_off: Now auto raffle is disabled in this chat
auto_spin_still_off: Auto raffle is not on in this chat
admin_allow: Now this user *have* admin rights on this bot
admin_still_allow: This user *already have* admin right on this bot
admin_deny: Now this user *doesnt have* admin rights on this bot
admin_still_deny: This user *dont have* admin rights on this bot
